hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo "MyBuild: Pre-check and delete existing resources/groups" az login --service-principal -u $ARM_CLIENT_ID -p $ARM_CLIENT_SECRET -t $ARM_TENANT_ID az account set -s $ARM_SUBSCRIPTION_ID
if [ $(az group show -n "$ARM_RESOURCE_GROUP" --query id --output tsv) ]; then az group delete -n "$ARM_RESOURCE_GROUP" --yes echo "MyBuild: Deleted resource group $ARM_RESOURCE_GROUP" fi
if [ $(az resource show -g "$ARM_IMAGE_RESOURCE_GROUP" -n "$ARM_IMAGE_NAME" --resource-type "Microsoft.Compute/images" --query id --output tsv) ]; then az image delete -n "$ARM_IMAGE_NAME" -g "$ARM_IMAGE_RESOURCE_GROUP" echo "MyBuild: Deleted image $ARM_IMAGE_NAME from resource group $ARM_IMAGE_RESOURCE_GROUP" fi
az logout

if [ ! -f ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub ]; then echo "MyBuild: Create SSH public and private key pair" ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 2048 -f ~/.ssh/id_rsa -N '' fi
echo "MyBuild: Provision VMSS with packer image" cd "${WORKSPACE}/jenkins-cicd-vmss/scripts/terraform" /usr/bin/terraform get /usr/bin/terraform init /usr/bin/terraform apply -auto-approve -var "location=${ARM_LOCATION}" -var "resource_group_name=${ARM_RESOURCE_GROUP}" -var "image_resource_group_name=${ARM_IMAGE_RESOURCE_GROUP}" -var "image_name=${ARM_IMAGE_NAME}" -var "dns_name=${DNS_NAME}" -var "admin_username=${VMAdminUsername}" -var "admin_password=${VMAdminPassword}"
